title: Harry Potter und der Plastikpokal 1-6 [Full HD] mit Untertiteln

json.text: Crikey, what a beautiful snake!
Gotcha!
Crocodile Hunter!
Oh man. This snake is really dangerous.
You better don't touch it like this,  or it'll get really angry.
Hello!
[Harry Potter and the Cup of Plastic]
Bernhard!
- Yo, yo, yo I'm baking a cup of cocoa ... - Bernhard!
Where's my cocoa?
I'm thirsty, Bernhard!
Rock 'n roll music?
Bernhard, you said you'd care for me,  even if I weigh 200 kilograms.
Those damn kids with their rock music and Pacman video games!
I don't care if my house burns down in the background, because I threw the potholder right into the flame.
Yeah, I'll be right there, I'll fuck you up!
Just watch out, Grandpa's coming!
Man, it's really dusty in here and full of cobwebs.
Yeah yeah, you can see that this is where the rockers live.
Are you tired of taking care of me, Wormtail?
Oh no.
No, my Lord, it ... it does not bother me at all.
I ... I really love feeding you with baby food and changing your diapers.
I ... I think I've developed maternal feelings.
I'd love to breastfeed you.
- Oh wait, I'm fat, I have breasts! - No!
Hello master, here's the pacifier that you wanted.
Thank you very much.
Can you read me a bedtime story?
Yes ... Yes, okay. Okay, listen:  Once upon a time, there was a very tiny cute dog
and it was walking through a forest, and everything was beautiful and there were flowers everywhere
and then a witch appeared and totally ran it over with a car.
Holy shit, a snake!
That's just Nagini, for fuck's sake.
So, Nagini is either saying there is a man eavesdropping on us at the door,
or she's being chased by a strange Australian
- called Steve Erwin. - Isn't he dead?
I can't really classify her dialect.
What now, Master?
- Finish the intruder, Wormtail. - Yes, Master.
I ... I was ...
I did not ... well ...
Well, I wanted ...
Bernhard? Where are you?
Harry Potter and the Cup of Plastic!
Whenever I watch it, I don't give a fuck about anything!
Badly copied, bad quality, badly produced, bad story.
Bad beats and bad jokes,
I stink when I sweat.
Oh yeah ... Pamela Anderson ...
Gina Wild ... Heidi Klum ...
- Hugh Jackman ... - Harry.
What ... why ... why ...?
What are you doing here?
Ever heard of privacy,  or knocking, huh?
What do you want? The door was open.
Besides, everyone could hear you downstairs in the kitchen.
Wake up, Ron! Wake up!
What ... what are you doing here?
I thought I'd just come here for no reason at three o'clock in the morning to wake you up.
We are going on the trip today, you fuckers!
Man, I had such a nice dream
about meatballs.
- Come on, kids! The trip is starting! - Yay!
Come on, let's sing our travelling song.
♫ I know a song that gets on everybody's nerves, ♫
♫ everybody's nerves, everybody's nerves ♫
♫ I know a song that gets on everybody's nerves... ♫
A few hours later and 300 kilometers farther
- ♫ I know a song that goes ... ♫ - Mornin'!
- ♫ on everybody's nerves ... ♫ - Mornin' Arthur, "how are you"?
Yo, I'm quite good, but the kids ran out of steam after 200 kilometers.
And "how are you"? Where's your son, anyway?  Didn't he want to come with you?
- No harm done.  - G'day, you're the boy who dies at the end right?
- Uh-huh.
So stupid, ugh.
*Lesbian - Cam*
Oh my God.
You're Harry Potter, right?
- Yes. - Hey, don't become too close friends with my son,
'cause he dies at the end of the movie.
Okay, thanks.
Dad, how long do we still have to go?
- Where are we even going for the trip? - I'll only say this: Disneyland...
- ...is it not. - Oh my God, no!
That cannot be true,
- that's even better than Disneyland! A trip to a... - Oh God, no!
♫ Shoe! ♫
Dad, that must have been insanely expensive.
Hey, that whole trip just for an old scruffy shoe?! You're kidding me!
Shut up, our family  can't afford more, you fucker!
- Okay ... - Guys touch the shoe! - Oh yeah!
- I want to touch the shoe, too! - Oh, I want to touch the shoe.
- Ew, I touched shit! - Oh, that brings good luck.
- Harry, do you want to touch shit, too? - Uhh no...
- No, no... - And now the fun begins!
How the hell are you doing that?
Lol! We let it fly!
What ... what was in that shoe? On what sort of trip am I?
- God! - And we can fly.
What the hell is going on here?
- Where ... what is ...? - Hi, I wiped my nose,
- do you want to be friends? - Okay.
Alright, let's go on.
Hey.
Hey, what was that right now? Hey!
Didn't you think that was abnormal?
Hello! Hey, wait for me!
Hey, stop ignoring me.
- Hey ... - Alright guys!
What's going on here?
- Buy my fuzzy balls! - Ice cream!
- Nut Tarts! - Buy them!
- They can fly, they're great! - Candy!
Stolen car radios! Who would like to buy a stolen car radio?
Dude, it's awesome here!
Alright, here we are.
This is our tent.
Come in, so you can look out.
Okay, huii!
Huii!
Huii!
Huii.
Huii!
- Alright, and now me... - But if the whole family was at home,
who arranged the tent?
- I want to sit at the table. - Weeweeweewee!
- I'll sit too. - Stupid backpack, you.
- What did the kids pack in there again?! - My "Mettman" action figure.
- Wow. - And stone sandwiches.
Oh, that's obviously my favorite dish.
- Uhm I'll go to the bedroom. - Me too!
And, Harry, what do you think of the place?
"Awesomatico".
Only the SVW, only the SVW,
only the SVW ...
Only the SVW,
- Only the SVW, the SVW only ... - Wow, I can see our house from here.
Well, look at that. The lower class  is one level higher than me.
That's so funny, Dad!
Oh man, you crack the best jokes, I mean, it's so funny when you think about it!
Shut up, it's not even funny.
Oh, come on, let's get out of here, ugh.
- Argh, my favorite finger! - Oh, there was a fly.
I just wanted to scare it away.
Thank you...
Hey! Only the SVW will be the Quidditch Champion!
Werder Bremen!
Hey, here they come!
Help!
Oh, apparently no one has told  SV Werder Bremen,
that this is about Quidditch  and not about soccer.
Well, and since they couldn't fly, they all had to die.
- Werder Bremen! - What the hell, guys!
They crashed down!
- No, they were flying; they could fly. - They were flying, they flew so high.
- Let me...
You're absolutely crazy!
- You live in a fantasy world! - Haha, Ron is living in the reality.
Haha, real life fag!
- Lol! Lol! - Rofl, Rofl! Rofl, rofl!
- Lol, Lol! Lmao! Rofl! - Lol! Lol!
What's going on here, hey?
Hey boys! Hey, shut it!
Don't you hear that?
I think there's a war going on outside!
Quick, everybody get out!
- Come on, hurry! Oh God, how awful! Hurry up! - Oh God! Oh God, war!
Who's even attacking?
I'll only say this: The Russians are here.
Attention, attention, Ladies and Gentlemen, there is a war going on.
- Please run around in circles screaming, thank you. - Oh, alright.
- Quick, come here, Harry! - Yeah.
- ♫ I walk with my lantern, and my lantern with me, ♫ - Oh shit, a lantern walk!
♫ The stars are shining above, and we're shining down here ... ♫
- Harry! Harry! - Harry, come here, hurry, come on!
Yeah, just one moment, I'll be right there!
- One moment... - Harry!
Yeah, just a second, I'll come!
- Come quickly! - Harry! - Hi! Yeah, I wanted to buy a car radio, just one moment!
Now, where was the booth again?
♫ My light is out, we're going home, Rabimmel, rabammel, rabum! ♫
I love this song!
Where should I go?
Where do I have to go?
I fell, I can't stand up on my own!
Help...
Help!
Help!
Oh, I hope we can stop running soon.
Help!
Yeah, I think that'll be enough.
Helga!
Helga!
No, no, wait, I'm really looking for my girlfriend Helga.
- Helga! - Oh man, ugh, you don't get it!
- Helga ... - Hey, where are you, you stupid jerk?
Ugh, this is what happens when I leave her alone just once.
I'll make our secret sign.
Ravioli!
Well, could that, with a lot of imagination, look like ravioli?
Yes!
No, Snape ... Stop petting with Dumbledore!
- Helga! - Helga!
Who's screaming?
- Helga! - Helga!
- Who is this? - Helga!
- Helga! - Where are you?
Better get out of here.
What's going on, why is everything burned?
Did I miss something?
Helga!
- Who the hell is Helga? - Harry!
- Oh God, we have been looking for you for ages! - Yes, for like two minutes, ey.
Hey look at the sky, don't you think that looks like ravioli?
- Nah. - Use your imagination.
Imagination!
Hey, relax! Stop this, you are crazy, with your bad sound effects!
- Kids, are you allright? - Yes.
Hey, it's me, the candy man.
- Who wants a lollipop rod? - Shut your trap already!
Lollipop rod?
- Lollipop rod! Who wants to suck it, huh? Huh? Huh? - Is that licorice?
Don't let yourself get involved with that, Harry!
- But I like licorice! - That jerk just wants to feel us up,
so you better distract him!
- Ohh, Superman's flying over there! - Where?
That was a good distraction, wasn't it?
Because ... because Superman
- is a fictional character, and they don't exist at all. - Yo, I got that.
You didn't, huh?
- Well, I got it! - So nobody wants to suck, huh?
Stop! Stop, wait! Just one moment!
There's a three-headed monkey standing behind you!
Where?
Argh, I fell for it again!
Argh, no one wants to suck on my lollipop rod!
Where else could I go?! I could go to Hogwarts...
- Goodbye! - Guys, I have a feeling that this school year
is going to be exactly like the last one:
People try to rape me, and we fuck people over.
But this ravioli sign,
it's got some kind of higher meaning.
Now it looks like a pretzel.
Oh my God, I can't believe it:
Smoked turkey bacon is 30% off at Lidl.
What a steal!
... something to nosh on?
- Do you want something to nosh on? - I do!
- Do you want something to nosh on? - Me too!
- I do! - Me too, me too! - Well, children?
Do you want something to noash on?
Yes, me, right here.
I'll have large french fries.
Here you go, that's one Euro.
- But that's not large! - One fry, one Euro!
- A Euro, give me one euro! - Okay well, here.
- Didn't even get mayo ... - I want, I want...
- What ... What do I want to take? - Aloha!
I'd like a spicy wiener.
Yes...
Here...
- Yes, here you are. - Mahalo.
Do you want a spicy wiener, too?
Nah. No, thanks, I've already got one.
Something to nosh on?
Could I have some of that...
- Ahoj - sherbet? - Here you are.
Harry, is something wrong with you?
You seem so tense, somehow.
Hey, you want me to tell you something?
These marshmallows right here
don't taste like french fries at all.
- They aren't french fries, Ronald McDonald. - Fucking lice.
If I may point something out,
you've got a boner.
That's its normal state?!
I don't even know it any other way, anymore.
Listen up, that is disgusting.
You either jerk off in the toilet right now,
or I'll cut it off bit by bit with my nail scissors.
Think of something asexual, think of something asexual.
Let's be best friends!
... And bacon and mayonnaise and pickle jar water.
So, that was the last point of the School Rules.
Please remember that. It's very important!
Wow, I've never seen him run.
What is wrong with you?
You ... you ...
You said I ...
I should let you know
if someone is at the door.
So what?
- Well, there's someone at the door. - Yeah, then let them in.
OK.
Yo, children, listen up,  up next is a very important message:
There will be a gigantic battle!
No no no no no. Not what you think
not a rap battle between me and Lord Voldemort, because
that would be boring and I'd win anyway. No, much better:
You have to battle kids from another school.
- What was that? - Exactly!
- And by that I mean the whole monty! - But what does that mean?
Smearing gum into someone's hair,
pouring cocoa in backpacks, and stabbing jackknifes in the eyes.
- Okay. - Since this has been cleared up,
greet, with a very loving and very nice applause,
the lovely little Parisian girls
from the Frenchy Posse!
Huh? Frenchy sluts ...
Nous sommes jolies
C'est une petite banane
C'est une petite banane!
There!
Girls with
Ass.
We are so wonderful, we fart butterflies.
Dude, she looks like Snape, just with make up.
Quick, here's a
double salto and calabums.
Done.
- Awesome! Girls! I'm into girls! - They were good, weren't they?
Err, there was a stain, yeah.
Well, well, well, well,
alright, kids!
Now, shut up!
Up next, the children
of the Russian Academy!
Or Bulgarians?
Well, anyway, something with vodka!
♫ One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, hey! ♫
♫ Me ol' Bamboo, me ol Bamboo, ♫
♫ you'd better never bother with me ol' bamboo, ♫
♫ you can have me hat or me bum-ber-shoo, but you'd better never bother with me ol' bamboo! ♫
Is that a circus?
Is that the clown? He looks funny.
♫ but you'd better never bother with me ol' bamboo! ♫
And here is their headmaster, Igor Karkaroff!
Hello, Fresh D.
Yes. Okay, enough.
Alright, now let us show these noobs how to really make music.
Ayy!
Everybody join in!
On the count of three!
Five, eleven, three!
♫ Yo, my name is Fresh Dumbledore, ♫
♫ back from the underground, back for more, ♫
- ♫ Im rapping here, Im rapping there, ♫ - What the fuck?
♫ I rap a hundred times better than the Dark Lord, ♫
♫ Yo, motherfucker! ♫
And now in canon, where are your hands?
♫ Yo, I am Fresh Dumbledore, ♫
♫ back from the underground, back for more, ♫
♫ Im rapping here, Im rapping there, ♫
♫ I rap a hundred times better than the Dark Lord, ♫
♫ Yo, motherfucker! ♫
I like you, you're pretty.
I wanted to tell you lots of Merci once again for inviting me here,
- Yo, I bet you and Hagrid will get along great. - Hello.
Monsieur Hagrid, you know what just occured to me?
Yeah?
Your face looks like I do under my skirt.
Oh, many people tell me that.
Fucking jerk! Well fuck, poop ...
... fucking fork, you ass-poop-sausage!
Yo, I'll be off again.
Alright, children, up next is the most exciting moment of your life.
That thing next to me is the infamous
Fire Tombola!
- I don't even know it, it isn't famous at all. - You throw your name in there,
and maybe you get to win the mysterious prize at the end,
that I won't tell you about.
Yes, but everyone who participated  gets a really great consolation prize.
Band-aids.
Coincidentally, I'm here too.
Evil!
This person is evil!
Evil!
I don't like that music.
- I have to puke. - What is this?
Now, that's what I call music.
Judging by the way he talks, it seems like he really needs to pinch a loaf. (in german: "pinch a nigger")
What?
Dude, look.
He's got a bionic eye!
That's a hundred billion thousand billion million  times better than a normal eye.
Bionic eye: Activated.
Well, if that isn't Udo!  I could already hear you from afar.
- Yeah, fucking squeaking shoes. - Well, tough luck.
Tough luck, you've got tough luck and I haven't.
- Ha! - Alright, first of all one Pepsi.
Hey look, he's drinking Pepsi.
Yeah, he probably won't be able to sleep tonight then.
- Yo, okay, do it. - Hello.
- Pull your shit off. - Hello. It's me, the candy man
- From now on, I'll drive infront of your school with my baker's van - I have seen that somewhere once.
and sell candy every morning.
No stupid cheese rolls like the ones in your cafeteria, no, only sugary stuff.
- Sugar, lots of sugar ... - What?
- lots of it... - Sugar is evil!
Sugar makes you hyperactive!
Hitler loved sugar!
- That's right! ... - Can I get a Milky Way or a Mars?
- Shut your pie holes! - Who's still eating Mars? That's unmanly.
- Snickers has nuts. - Alright, now pay attention!
Look what I can do. I let it melt,
I am a wizard.
I'm so in, because I'm sitting next to Indians.
Huh?! That wasn't even my intention.
Oh, that's why it's called Fire Tombola,  Now I finally get it.
Yo, this is the Fire Tombola!
Yes ... As I might have already mentioned in the beginning,
I'll gladly repeat it again, in case you  forgot it in the last couple of minutes,
just as if a few weeks more have passed.
Throw your name into the Tombola and you win a great prize.
But I won't tell you what the secret secret-prize is.
You'll never guess it.
Oh man, it must be something incredibly nice!
I'm so conspicuously inconspicuous,
because I'm looking left and right.
Hello, children.
- It's me, Udo. - Hello.
I'll just write that on the board...
- It doesn't say "Udo"! - Yeah!
Do you know how little I care?  I'm not your German teacher.
I'm teaching the cruelest subject at the entire school, okay?
- Maths? - PE?
Home economics!
Whats up?!
This subject needs to be taken seriously, okay?
It's extremely important.
So,
Today we're going to learn how to make egg pancakes, who can tell me an ingredient?
- Eggs. - Oh, that was fast, my last class did not know that.
250 grams of flour, 400 ml milk and then ...
Wait! I haven't finished writing "eggs" yet!  I can't write that fast!
It doesn't even say "eggs"!
I've told you to  shut up, for fuck's sake!
So, what did you say last? Flour is right!
- Flour... - Fucking gum, doesn't taste like anything anymore,
- I'll stick it here. - Hey, I can see you with my bionic eye,
if you stick it there, you're dead, boy!
Oh, he won't do anything anyway, I mean ...
STUPID BOY
- Die! - Oh no!
Haha, your "explosives skill" is not high enough.
That's not true, I was just too far away!
Wait until I get a level-up.
- You! - Yes?
Stand up.
Now tell me another ingredient for pancakes.
- Say "a penis". - Well, I'm waiting?
♫ Eggs and lard, butter and salt, milk and flour, ♫
♫ Safran makes the cake yellow. ♫
Yeah, you recited that poem beautifully. To learn that you probably
forgot the names of all of your siblings, right?
Okay, let's get back to pancakes.
God, only one minute of class,  and I already hate that guy.
Restrain yourself, Hermione, restrain yourself.
So, I hope you all got the basic recipe for pancakes, right?
Yes.
What else would you put in there?
- Oh, I ... I, I ... - What?
Yes, you squirt right here in the front?
Stand up! Come on!
- Who would ever pick Neville?! - So...
Now tell me, what else would you put in there,  and be creative, alright?
How about
raisins?
Raisins! I think that's great, that's a great idea,
- come here. - Raisins are bullshit, I hate raisins!
They're nothing but rotten grapes!
Someone's on his period.
Hey, why is there a dead spider lying next to Hermione?
Bullshit, yeah?
Uh, why is he coming to me?
I didn't even say that.
What ... What's your problem?
I'm thirsty. Time to drink a Pepsi.
Wow, how bassy.
Ugh, I'm so glad it's over ...
- Hey, you know what my special ingredient is? - Yeah...
- Whisked crap with strawberries, - Uh huh ...
- Yeah... - That's my favorite ingredient for pancakes. God, - You are absolutely right.
- I hate this class! Pancakes, ugh! That is... - Oh yeah.
- Yes... - That's completely pointless, isn't it?
Who ... who needs stuff like that?
- I don't care about that at all. That's.. - Dude, will she ever stop.
- Utter crap, okay? This knowledge.. - I thought the class was really interesting.
- ..is useless! - I like pancakes.
And I like raisins, they feel like nipples.
- Oh Ron, you've never even seen nipples. - Yes I did, my own!
That's not the same. Raisins, ugh.
Even the pure thought of Neville makes me wanna puke!
There he is.
Hey, let me through...
... here.
- Hey, you there. You're the one with the raisins, right? - It wasn't anything personal, okay?
You look sad.
You need something to cheer you up?
Alright, then come with me, I'll show you... uhm...
- ... Bunny-Babys. - I wanna see Bunny-Babys too.
Did I say "Bunny-Babys"?  I meant tax returns.
Hey, the window looks like a bawling Snape,
- let's get outta here, it's extremely ugly. - Okay.
I'm not ugly.
Wet! Wet! Wet! Wet! Wet! Wet! Wet! Wet!
Oh my God, it's raining!
Yes, Fire Tombola, hopefully I win something.
Go! Go! Throw your note in there too.
OK.
Come on, Ceddel!
- Yes... - Come on, Ceddel!
Do you want me to throw it in there?
- Should I throw the note in there? - Yes! Yes!
Throw the note in there already, Ceddel.
- Alright. - He threw the note in.
- Yes, you did it, Ceddel! - I've thrown it in!
- Hello. - I've thrown it in!
- Cuddle me! - Don't be pretentious about it, Ceddel.
Stupid jerk.
So, I heard the secret prize you can win is either
a High School diploma or a Nintendo Wii.
Yeah well, I'd choose the Wii.
Hey! Look, the two of us! Yeah, we'll take part too!
We're so gonna win.
- ...a Nintendo Wii, or a Playstation 3 ... - Yes, yes, we'll participate in the raffle.
- But you're not going to win anything. - Hey, isn't that the lesbian?
We've never even spoken to you. What's your name, anyway? And why can't we win anything?
Do you see the glowing circle right there? This is a magical boundary that prevents dickheads like you
from participating at all.
How so?
With each lottery there is a clause that says  that staff and relatives mustn't participate,
and you are related.
- No. - Oh, yes, because of your incest family you are practically
- related to everyone. - And what if we drink lots of sperm?
And thus get genetic material from someone else?
We stole them from a sperm bank, no idea whose that is.
Here's to love. Cheers!
Admittedly, this contradicts everything I learned in Biology class, but ...
Sick shit.
- I go first. - No, I go first.
Okay, together.
Yeah, we'll win a Wii! Yeah!
Oh shit.
Hey, what's happening to my face?
- What's happening to my face? - Shit, did you take Fresh D sperm?
- It's your fault! - People always ask me,
why I am so great.
- Shit, so disgusting, man! - Fight, fight!
Take it back! I'll beat your jaws up!
- Fight, fight! - Hey, that's what I call a Fresh D battle.
Damn idiots, I'll continue reading the Bible.
Where was I? Oh yeah, Matthew 12, verse 17.
♫ Pump p p pump pump it up ♫
- Wow. - ♫ (Just Blaze) Pump p p pump pump it up ♫
- Wow. - ♫ Look, pump it up if you came to get it krunk ♫
♫ With a dame and shit that's drunk ♫
♫ You came to get it on. ♫
♫ More than 5 O's in your bank, then get it on! ♫
♫ Roll up like that stank and get it on! ♫
♫ Slank that fitted on. ♫
♫ Came to get it on! ♫
♫ Hold up she want work that twork that. ♫
♫ Then again let me hurt that,  ♫
Hey, what is that? ♫ ... murk that! ♫
Hey, is that supposed to be hip-hop? ♫ 'Til you gotta hurt back, ... ♫
What sort of crappy music is this? ♫ ...can't spit it out, boo you gotta slurp that. ♫
It's not even mine! ♫ Can't cuddle after we done, it wasn't worth that. ♫
I said, turn it off! ♫ Joey I'm responsible for bringin' ... ♫
So...
Now let's create a nice, chilled mood.
Ron, put your pants back on.
Oh, holy Fire Tombolaaaaaah.
Tell us, who are the winneeeeeeeers?
OK.
Here!
What kind of writing is that?
- Yes, I think its the guy from Russia, or Poland, or so! - Bulgaria!
- Yes. Yes. - I'm so happy for you!
Come on down here, okay?
Congratulations.
Do I get a Nintendo now?
Yes, back there, go away now, okay?
- Yes. - Wow.
Oh, unfortunately the name has been burned off here.
Well, then I'll have to pick someone by myself.  I'll pick the blonde Frenchy-bitch!
Me? Oh, I so did not expect that.
Oh, Merci.
- Merci. - Yeah, don't swear at me because I can't speak French.
- Go there. - Oui?
Ha!
Alright...
Ah yes, as I expected:  The boy who dies at the end!
- Oh my God. - Ceddel!
- Thank you. - All the best, Ceddel!
- I'm so dead. - I didn't even say your name.
- All the best, Ceddel! Break a leg! - Oh cool, thanks.
And the rest of you have probably already wondered what the secret prize, that they have won, is.
I will
reveal that secret now. Watch out that your heart
does not explode with joy.
Alright.
Here is the price you've all have been waiting for ...
The Cup of Plastic!
It is made of plastic and glows in the dark!
Oh wow, now that's extremely boring.
Yes, here, Cup of Plastic, beautiful, right?
Yes, first, I'm asking for the roaring crowd to be silent.
Oh, yeah, I can't even contain myself with happiness!
What's going on there?
Someone cheated!
Ha, I'm laughing in my mind.
This is the culprit!
Oh, fall faster, you fucking paper!
Stupid, lame gravity.
So what does it say on here?
Amanda.
Who the hell is Amanda? Oh, here's the last name: Dermichknutscht!(="who kisses me")
Is Amanda Dermichknutscht here? (="a man there who kisses me")
Hello, is Amanda Dermichknutscht here?
Oh, oh no.
- No, no, that cannot be true. - Who the hell is Amanda?
- I ... No, I ... - Come on, now go.
